creditline: Gift of Richard L. and Roberta G. Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Red ground with narrow white warp stripes at selvedge edges; finely executed weft patterning, primarily geometric designs, diamonds, zigzags, triangles, lighening motifes, but also several sections of bird motifs; multi-colored patterns; three elaborate pompoms on each end.
dimension: 85 1/4 x 3 3/4 in. (216.54 x 9.5 cm) (with fringe 95 1/4 inches)
title: Headwrap (Cinta)
